body: @GoogleMeBitch youre a fuckin G, bro - thanks!
Sanbun Kyoden loses his touch long time ago. I think he needs a new writer for his stories. His recent works had almost the same plot with just different characters.

Sanbun is a legend. I want him to continue as long as he can. nobody else got the right to say otherwise. but he definitely need to change something up and save his time on shorter stories. no point to overcommit on this lengthy series anymore
Turns out that there's an option to blacklist artists instead of being a hater and bitching about them to retire \_(ツ)_/
Another long series from sanbun kyoden? Wow...
Just retire man, literally all of their series is the same rehashing plot.
This is definitely 20 chapters long and sanbun kyoden is a hack and he needs to retire.
This looks like it's going to a long and deep story. Not ideal for NTR. Best to keep it short and sweet unless it's a good story.
@Stck yeah there on here in the HOTMiLK Koime Volumes. Here's Ch.2 (337869) Ch.3 (345887) Ch.4 (353542) Ch.5 (367593)
@GoogleMeBitch are the untranslated chapters on here?

This story is not interesting at all. far from Gekkakou no Ori. even that one nothing special and overstretched. should just focused on Akebi no Mi series. simple repetitive short story suits him more. focusing on this makes that series on hold for too long.
It wont be, but the wife will leave her family for the other guy, just like all his stories do.
